name: Asteroids (itch) (Kauyon_Kais)
description:
Asteroids - a small project I made mostly for myself, to learn how to finish projects. But, why not share?

Made in Unity using acegikmo's wonderful Shapes library.

Features:

❌ QoL Settings
❌ UFOs
❌ Display Options
❌ Pause Button
⭕ Fancy Graphics
✔ Is Finished

Controls are easy: W goes fast, A/D turn the ship, Space and RMB to shoot. Alternatively, use M for thrust and S/N for turning.
